meanings.definition: A bright light used to illuminate a large area, typically outdoors.
meanings.sent1: The football field was bright under the floodlights.
meanings.sent2: The park looked beautiful under the floodlights at night.
meanings.sent3: The floodlights made the playground look like a magical land.
meanings.sent4: The floodlights turned the dark field into a glowing sea of light.
meanings.sent5: The floodlights shone like a thousand stars in the night sky.

meanings.sent1: They floodlit the stage for the concert.
meanings.sent2: The stadium crew floodlights the entire field before the game.
meanings.sent3: He floodlights his backyard for evening gatherings.
meanings.sent4: The movie set was floodlit to create a dramatic effect.
meanings.sent5: The garden was floodlit to showcase the beautiful flowers at night.
